website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for anyone looking for a more practical solution for towel bar. Provides extra storage in a simple and convenient manner.
pros: Convenient extra storage for small objects over the towel bar
Shelf surface provides plenty of grip so objects don't fall off
cons: Extra shelf can break if enough force is used while showering

customer_reviews.title: You must have a power drill to install
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and went right to assemble it. On the instructions it says tools needed- flat head screwdriver, Phillips head screwdriver, hammer. Then you turn it over and the first instruction is to drill holes with a 1/4” drill bit for the wall mounts. WTF. Why is “power drill” not listed as “tools needed?! I do not have a power drill so now instead of setting up my new shelf, I had to repackage it and throw it in a closet until I’m able to get a power drill. Whenever that is. Thanks for the clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Ballew

customer_reviews.title: Pretty for a deal
customer_reviews.text: Basically on top of all the previous reviews which to me seems pretty spot on - I would just add that it is a simple/ minimalistic fixture and you must keep that in mind depending on what would you use it for. It's definitely not heavy duty so I'd be careful with towel placement and try not place anything too large or heavy upon the shelf. I would recommend keeping it out of reach of children or persons whom could be easily harmed. The frosted glass although a bit narrow in depth, seems pretty sturdy and easy to keep clean and brass mounts have a nice finish to it. Easy to install as previous reviewers have described.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I had just completed a full bathroom renovation and needed a shelf with a towel rack and I came across this product. I absolutely love this shelf. It looks perfect in the craftsman style bathroom that we remodeled since it has a 1920's vintage look to it with the tempered glass. It was easy to install as I was able to do so in a matter of about 20 minutes. It look perfect and I would recommend this product. I wish I could find one just like this only smaller so I could place it on the other wall where I need a towel rack.
customer_reviews.author: jbug

customer_reviews.title: I love this shelf
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! My apartments towel rack was so ugly and cheap looking. This shelf fit perfectly where it was and adds such a nicer look! Shelf is very stable as long as the bottom screws are tight enough!
customer_reviews.author: xharringtona

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to install and wouldn't recommend to others.
customer_reviews.text: pain in the butt to install and honestly just not worth the money. I wouldn't recommend it to others. My husband and I tried for over an hour to get it installed and couldn't so we just gave up and I now have a towel rack/shelf that I can't even use. :(
customer_reviews.author: lauren schindler

customer_reviews.title: Very hard install, not made well at all
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Bought it after reading some good reviews, but they must have gotten a better product. First, it took my husband over a hour to install because he had to drill multiple holes because the round mounting brackets do not mount tight against the wall in order to keep it shelf from wiggling and it wont hold the glass shelf securely. Second, this is only big enough for hand towels, the bar doesn't come far enough away from wall to easily put a full sized towel on it. I also wouldn't trust it to hold a full sized towel (which is what we bought it for), it definitely is not made well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Willet

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m super glad I ordered this .!for the price you really can add a nice touch to the bathroom ! It was easy to install and I was super proud !I’ve been looking for a while but didn’t want to spend a large amount of money ...the other thing I’d like to mention it comes with hardware , I would use one of suppliers screw and purchase the same size screw difference larger flat end part where you screw in this way it had more mass to cover the hole and create a better grip ( my walls were hollow so I don’t feel comfortable placing heavy objects on the glass ) hope this helps !!
customer_reviews.author: New york

customer_reviews.title: Glass piece cut wrong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of months ago as I was planning my bathroom remodel. When I finally went to install it, I had the holes drilled in the wall and one half mounted, and then found out that the glass piece is cut crooked so one end doesn't fit into the groove. I am very disappointed that the whole thing is useless now. I will try to post a picture to prove my point. Based on my experience, I would recommend you DO NOT purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: R. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Cheap and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This shelf looks great, I'm really pleased, especially for the price. Coordinates well with my other brushed nickel fixtures in the bathroom. Yes, it's small but so is the bathroom so it works just fine for me--I'm happy to have any extra shelf space. It was a snap to put up but I did need the husband for the last step as you have to hold the glass panel and towel bar in place while you screw the 2nd wall fixture in--that'd be pretty tricky for one person especially since the shelf is glass and dropping it would be catastrophic. Still, it was a snap and seems to be stable; we'll see if it all comes crashing down : )
customer_reviews.author: shoegirl23

customer_reviews.title: design flaw
customer_reviews.text: First off I bought this at a reduced price. So I think I didn't get instructions. The design has a flaw. The mounts are round therfore they can turn around. This can make the towel bar and glass to fall out. It looks good but I will glue the bar in so it stays together. Previous purchaser returned this probably for this reason. Despite the problem I like the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmama

customer_reviews.title: I originally said very solid glass, which it is - and it broke my tile floor when it fell off the wall
customer_reviews.text: Very solid glass. The brushed nickle dresses up the small powder room. My only con is the tiny screws attaching the posts; I never have a screw-driver small enough to fit. I'm changing my review, this fell apart constantly after the 1st couple months and eventually the glass slipped out of the silver arms that are supposed to hold it. There's no screws to tighten, it all just kinda relies on the top arms not moving at all or the whole thing falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Installation poor
customer_reviews.text: Would not install properly. Glass was too wide would not fit into slots. For final installation Set screws would not line up properly for unit to stay mounted to wall, overall tolerances too sloppy, would not trust this shelf or rack to hold anything without collapsing. Plus this wasted at least an hour of my time.
customer_reviews.author: Suzi A-J

customer_reviews.title: Glass Did NOT Fit and Broke
customer_reviews.text: Design OK, but glass was not "square", meaning it was two different widths on each end. Therefore, one end would NOT fit into the slot on the metal that holds the glass shelf. One end fit easily into the slot position, but the other did not. I tried to make it fit, but ended up completely breaking the glass into hundreds of tiny pieces. Thank goodness I didn't cut myself, but I am still finding small pieces of glass a week later. Poor quality inspection I would have to say. Very frustrated and disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jones

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I needed a shelf and towel bar for my bathroom we just revamped a bit. This was the perfect size and was easy to install. I haven't added the "sinks" to make it more sturdy (forgive me, I forgot the real name of the plastic piece that goes in before the screws), so I have limited weight on there now. A 'normal' sized bath towel will probably be needing to be folded to hang up, but that's not a big deal for us. Overall, really enjoy the look!
customer_reviews.author: hnicole89

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shelf. I use these for plants as vines can grow on the hanging bar below and light gets up through the glass part of the shelf, and they work great. My only feedback is that they're a bit hard to get all the pieces to fit together perfectly upon installation. However now that I've done more than one I have gotten good at it and can do it in 20-30 mins. All in all, I will be ordering more of these as my vines grow longer. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Hardware was not accurate in sizes the wall anchors were too big for the screws So the screws never tightened and the towel bar kept falling off due to the bars bracket moves easily back and forth so it falls so its not sturdy .Very hard to install due to unstable sturdiness to many parts stay loose .
customer_reviews.author: Liz Avendano

customer_reviews.title: Solid value at an economical price
customer_reviews.text: Attractive addition to the bathroom. More for decor than function as it is a narrow shelf, but still useful for hanging a towel or two and putting decor or toiletries. Very satisfied with the quality. Feels very solid. Like the slightly tinted glass as it feels almost like beach glass in my seashore themed bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: travel lover

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and faulty
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrible towel rack. It's cheap. First, the first shipment arrived broken. The supplier shipped me a new one, which is great. Second, you need drill bits. Third, the screws are not the correct size for keeping the rack in place. They still twist and the glass and rod slip out. This is a super cheap product and will not stay stable on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Guy who bought it

customer_reviews.title: Not a Simple Install
customer_reviews.text: Even though I love the look of this simple shelf for the price, I can’t give it a 5 star. The glass had to be sanded down because it wouldn’t fit in the cutout. I had to drill additional holes in the mounting pieces because they kept spinning in the wall even after using the wall anchors causing the glass and rod to fall out with the slightest pressure. In the end, I got it to work but only because I didn’t want to give up on it. It required a lot more work than necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Shelf - Hard To Put Up
customer_reviews.text: Shelf was purchased for a smaller bathroom. I needed something to set the qtip and cotton ball holders on. I'm only giving 4 stars as getting this thing on the wall was a hassle. It's a pretty shelf that seems to fit the bill what I needed it to hold. I wouldn't put anything heavy on it. The glass is thicker than normal shelf glass and the finish is nice. However, finding a screwdriver that is super tiny to get the screws in to keep it held to the wall took me longer than getting this up on the wall itself. Maybe providing a small tool would be a great idea
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Strong shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a very handy person when it comes to installing items on my wall, and I was able to get this up on my own. The tempered glass is strong and has been holding up nicely with all of my toiletries on it. So far, no problems with this item. I like it a lot and wish I had found it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: sandbar21

customer_reviews.title: Classy shelf
customer_reviews.text: Classy looking shelf and towel bar for our recently renovated bathroom. The towel bar is a thin wall tube so I wouldn't recommend trying to hang anything heavier than a couple hand towels or wash cloths on it but other than that the quality is quite nice for the price. The assembly makes me a bit nervous since the glass and towel bar are basically only pinched between the two posts. I'd probably feel a little more comfortable if the towel bar actually held the two posts together somehow but we'll see how well it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: The Suts

customer_reviews.title: The first one I received had deep scratches on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received had deep scratches on the brackets that hold the glass shelf. I sent it back and got a replacement that was damaged in exactly the same way. This seems to be a manufacturing flaw. I returned the second shelf for a refund and will purchase a different shelf.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: glass shelf didn't fit into brackets
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the product is very attractive. However, only one end of the glass would fit into the end brackets. The glass was cut just a little too large and we could not insert into in the end bracket. The wall mounts could not be tightened even with the large dry wall mounting screws. Wanted to love the product; it looked great with our bathroom but couldn't get it to work. We are returning it and looking for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Slm

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: While this looks amazing, I'm afraid to use it for fear of it falling apart. The design is horrible because the screws are too close together for the anchors to work correctly. The hardware it comes with is garbage as well. I ended up using one screw on each side with better anchors and it seemed to help a bit, but it's still very unsteady. The front part of the shelf has nothing holding it tightly together and it comes apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Hard to install but look great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shelf and beautiful accent for any bathroom. The problem I experienced installing in tighter areas was the way the bases are challenging to get on just right and took up far too much time than it shoulld. Other wise look very nice !
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lee

customer_reviews.title: Customer Servic
customer_reviews.text: This item worked great in my bathroom, which was very small. It looked great. When I moved I took it with me but lost a screw I needed. Called customer service and they were fantastic. I highly recommend this product and the Neu Home company!
customer_reviews.author: Roberta J. Fahr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, feels very sturdy. The glass part is somewhat small but its perfect if you just want to put decoration/small items to have it look like less clutter. The only thing that feels 'cheap' about this majorly is the towel bar but once you put it on, you can't tell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good - Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install with the included paper template that you tape one the wall to know the location of the 4 screw holes. We needed a hand towel holder and extra shelf space and this works great. I have not seen an Echo dot mount that I like and did not want to keep the Echo on the vanity that could get wet so this was the main reason for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Ramsay

customer_reviews.title: ASK FOR HELP BEFORE YOU HAVE A MILLION TINY PIECES OF GLASS ON YOUR FLOOR
customer_reviews.text: So much for tempered glass... got it almost fully assembled before I dropped the glass and it shattered into a million tiny pieces. Not a one person install job. Definitely ask for help on the last step to get the glass and pole assembled to the wall mounts at the same time. Other than that, I think it would be great. Seems to be quality material for the purpose and pleasing look.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bathroom shelf. It's wide enough to hold 2-3 hand towels depending on the size of them. Whoever said this won't hold a roll of toilet paper must be using the giant rolls, we use Charmin and they fit just fine. It's very pretty to look at and we've received a few compliments since putting it up.
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time waiting for it to come
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of crap... The only things that came in the box or the two nickel parts that hold the shelf in the glass shelf... There was literally no hardware and the towel rack was not in there. No directions were in there either.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, easy to install shelf/towel rack.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and install. I was only able to put one side in a stud so I used the provided hardware on the other side and its been up for several months. It holds extra perfumes, lotions and towels no problem. Matched my bathroom fixtures very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: These seem to range all over the board as far as price. I feel I made the best choice as far as price versus quality. Matched perfectly in the bath and is useful as well as appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Nunez

customer_reviews.title: This is great!! The only reason I gave it 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great!! The only reason I gave it 3 stars is because the screw to get this installed is so small that not even my husband who is a plumber and has every tool didn't even have! How do they expect people to have it they don't even give it to you! We got it up without taking it out but it was a pain
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: Lovely but not able to secure the shelf and it broke.
customer_reviews.text: After a month of use the glass shelf came off and glass chunks scattered all over the bathroom floor. Fortunately, it was tempered glass and easy to clean up. I would like to order a shelf but cannot find a way to do so.
customer_reviews.author: martie buzzard

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish, yet affordable glass shelf
customer_reviews.text: My partner and I love this glass shelf! They add the perfect touch to our bathroom. It was easy to install and looks very nice. Plus, at $13.15 each (I bought 2) it was a steal! Even though we didn't need the towel rack component, it was still the cheapest and most well-reviewed glass shelf on Amazon. I'd highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jasiel

customer_reviews.title: Looked nice but couldn't get it to mount straight
customer_reviews.text: When we hung it up, it wouldnt sit right on the wall no matter how many times we tried to fix it, it slanted forward. We ended up returning it and just buying something at hobby lobby instead. It looked nice. Just wish it mounted better.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Annin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle
customer_reviews.text: The final product looks decent for the price. However, the design is poor for assembly requiring multiple measurements and difficult assembly by one person. The dry-wall screws did not provide adequate support. I had to buy additional dry-wall mounting screws to make this moderately sturdy so that it would not be pulled from the wall while used. The towel rack is not big enough to hold an open bath towel
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: Works nice in my bathroom. It is sturdy but I wouldn't put anything real heavy on it, I think it is meant to be more of a "nice" piece then to hold enough really heavy. I wanted something to hang a nice towel on and display a few items and this works out great.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Payne

customer_reviews.title: Dress up your bathroom for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item with a great price! I put it my newly remodeled guest bathroom and it's beautiful and high quality
customer_reviews.author: Papi

customer_reviews.title: Practical frosted shelf with towel rack
customer_reviews.text: Put this shelf in a bathroom I remodeled about two years ago. I found it to be an attractive piece and it's proved to be very practical as well. I placed it next to my sink and above my toilet. Since I don't have any other towel hooks in there this shelf holds a hand towel and other toiletries and bathroom essentials. I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Super cute.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Easy to assemble and install! Has screw/anchor guides. Will want power drill but not necessary, and a level. Small flat head screwdriver with long bit. Very adorable for hand towels and small decor.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The shelf is really nice! Its a little bit of a pain to ...
customer_reviews.text: The shelf is really nice! Its a little bit of a pain to install. It does come with a template to help you install the shelf, however the template can up short for me and i had to re-drill. Also it has two tiny screws that you have to screw at the very end and require glasses screw driver. Me and my husband both have big hands and found that to be the hardest part lol.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: NICE LOOKING BATHROOM SHELF
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as expected, and undamaged. I have not installed it yet, so cannot give an opinion. Looks great and I really liked that it had a glass shelf instead of wire.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle Peck

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy installation. The template was great so I got the holes in the right place the first time. My one complaint is that the glass is not snug in-between the two supports. It is snug close to the wall, so it won't fall down, but the brackets don't keep it quite as tight at the front. I can literally slide the glass out the front, which is not supposed to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Luv2Bake

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: The glass came bent and took over an hour to attempt installing, just for us to have to take it down. It was not sturdy at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, good quality for price.
customer_reviews.text: It's more substantial than I thought it would be given the price. Super easy to install, took me about 10 minutes with a screwdriver and a drill. Color matches what I expected from the photo. A great addition for a small, low-profile shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Just What  I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed in my small bathroom. My son hung this right over the sink for me. It has my toothbrush, paste, and face cleaner on the shelf. I hang my face cloth and towel on the rung. This appears to be very good materials. It is a brushed nickel finish and sort of matches my Moen towel rod, even though they are from a different company. I hope to have this around for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love how the shelf looks and the towel bar matches my other towel bars. Easy for my husband to put up.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Excellant Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: excellant value, looks very nice and frees wall space that seems to make my bathroom bigger, while at the same time gives us a two towel rack with a beautiful frosted glass shelve. Follow the directions and you can assemble this with ease. I did need an extra arm while trying to turn the little screws on the arms that tighten the whole shelf together!
customer_reviews.author: Pcful

customer_reviews.title: This shelf was impossible to install. After installing four ...
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was impossible to install. After installing four bathroom fixtures from another retailer (towel ring, toilet paper holder, toothbrush holder, and soap dish) I could not get past the anchors. The placement for the anchors is required to be so close together, if not done perfectly creates huge holes in drywall. Save yourself the headache and buy a higher quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE.
customer_reviews.text: The worst thing we have ever bought on amazon. We tried mounting 3 separate times...after we repaired the wall after it ripped our drywall apart. We finally had to throw it away. Brand new bathroom and damaged. Can’t return because we are out of our 30 days. Very very very unhappy. We deserve our money back. Do NOT buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really love this shower shelf. Easy to install. Installed in our previous home, bought another for new home. Well made and easy to install on tile.
customer_reviews.author: TriciaMaria

customer_reviews.title: Very nice rack for the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I was originally shopping for a single towel rack or hook, but came across this one. Grest purchase decision! Very easy to assemble, great quality, great look. Versatile space for holding random things in the bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: boardlover

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Durable!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy and pleased with this product! It is just what I needed for a newly remodeled bathroom in my house. It's just perfect size to allow for hanging multiple hand towels and provides a little shelf space to help keep my bathroom counter clutter free. It looks modern, feels like a quality product and was not difficult to install. If the finish/color is right for you, you like a contemporary look, and you have the wall space in your bathroom, I would not hesitate to purchase this product - you'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: T.Roy

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Evidently new homes do not come with towel bars and toilet paper holders, it’s an upgrade. Isn’t it a necessity though? Anyway I got two of these for my bathrooms and installed them myself in a matter of minutes. They look great. The plus side is they are where I want them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but a pain to put together.
customer_reviews.text: The shelf itself looks pretty good and the towel bar has had no issues holding up even large sized bath towels. My only complaint was that the included directions were of the "mount the main supports, then assemble the whole thing on the wall" type; because of the tiny retainer screws and the weight of the shelf (and fragile glass) it was a bit awkward getting everything into place.
customer_reviews.author: Kallah

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous shelf
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this shelf! It looks very pretty in our 1/2 bathroom downstairs. It holds our lotion, deodorizing spray, and extra soap without issues. We've gotten compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Camil E. Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks nice, could have been easier way for installation but not a problem
customer_reviews.author: Pablito

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to install, & sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Just finished bathroom remodel and this shelf adds a nice finishing touch. It was easy to install and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Deania Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price easy peezy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price easy peezy installation. Use a level and looks like professional installation. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!! Extremely easy installation, looks wonderful, and by far the most affordable thing I've come across. Love it so much, I'm ordering another one for my guest bath!
customer_reviews.author: luvuam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a hand towel rack to replace the one that took up too much valuable space on my very small vanity. The brushed nickel perfectly matches the faucet, and the glass shelf is nice for perfumes or toiletries.
customer_reviews.author: Livin' Free

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom shelf
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I did a bathroom facelift over the summer and this was one of the improvements. It looks great
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Simple to mount and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to mount and quite sturdy. It comes with a strip of paper that you use to mark on the wall where to drill the holes for the screws. I have a decent size candle, two small decorative bottles, as well as two hand towels on it. I'm not worried about it falling at all.
customer_reviews.author: birdie4573

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: I had a handyman put it up. Looks great! Love the color of the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Derrith E. Lambka

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: The towel bar is a little too close to the shelf for this to be a functional towel rod that you actually use. It is a lot better suited for the towel that you leave alone and look at.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: SIMPLE but Elegant!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my hand towel by the sink in the bathroom.... lets you decorate without it being too much in the bathroom
customer_reviews.author: NATALIE

customer_reviews.title: This shelf fell twice
customer_reviews.text: My husband installed this shelf for me and secured the plates that connect to the wall. The shelf has now fallen twice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy still. Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Would give 5 star but holes are very close to each other when putting it into the wall. Only used 1 screw on each side. Seems sturdy still. Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.author: annaaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our newly remodeled bathroom, easy to mount and holds lots of my wife's crap...
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Love this shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shelf! I wouldn’t put too much heavy stuff on it, but it looks great for little trinkets. A+
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. As pictured. Very pretty display. Do not plan to use for more than hand towels because it won't handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Buttons

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for our half bath and couldn't be happier. I found much more expensive ones at other ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our half bath and couldn't be happier. I found much more expensive ones at other online stores. Was happy to find this one at a way better price. Was very easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M. McCallum

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf/rack.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for a shelf like this in all the hardware stores in town & couldn't find anything close. Ordered off of Amazon & it is exactly what I was looking for at a great price. Love the glass shelf & the frosted look makes cleaning it easier than if it was clear. The quality of the shelf as a whole is very nice!
customer_reviews.author: danmel

customer_reviews.title: beautiful for a showroom
customer_reviews.text: It's very cute to look at but not very practical for everyday use. I got it for the look and price but not very practical, the glass part and the towel holder keep falling although I only put one towel on it. beautiful for a showroom!
customer_reviews.author: ALLY

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This product was so disappointing. It was super small and a pain to put together. It wouldn’t attach to the wall properly and I eventually just threw it away. A total waste of money in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and sleek wall shelf
customer_reviews.text: The design and quality is awesome. In a small bathroom, this is the perfect alternative to filling up your counter space with things like perfume, soap, and other beauty products. The only issue we had was with the mounting screws they provided. They were extremely cheap and kept bending when we would try to put them in the wall. Easy fix though in that we just bought our own from the hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Gooch

customer_reviews.title: looks and functions great
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a towel bar next to our sink and it works great. Sturdy and holds a full size towel no problem. The shelf is great for the wife's nick nacks. I took off 1 star because the arms on the side do allow for some side to side motion no matter how tight to tighten them, which leads to the towel bar being askew a little. No biggie I just straighten then up again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary & Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shelf! I put it over a very small sink in a guest bathroom and it fits in perfectly! The lines are sleek, the glass is a nice sturdy thickness, and it was easy to install. Nothing bad to say about this shelf!
customer_reviews.author: BABS of O-town

customer_reviews.title: Product came damaged
customer_reviews.text: When I received the product the glass shelf was shattered. My father had already put up the bar so it’s just attached to my wall right now with no shelf. It seems sturdy enough but it’s hard to tell without a shelf on it. Loved the photo but it’s hard to tell without the whole thing being assembled together. Very disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very nice addition!
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in my bathroom! Happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seemed nice. It was still in the package when my house burned down Sunday night.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Coll

customer_reviews.title: Just not a tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried to install this twice and I can't get it better than "loosey goosey". It won't stay solidly. It's not too cheap looking so I think it would look decent if I could get it mounted to my liking. UGH!
customer_reviews.author: DiDi

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This shelf is really nice. The glass is frosted and the satin towel bar is a perfect match to my others. Very high quality and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: WOW, this is beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! NO complaints! Even better than I thought it would be ! Glass is tempered & construction seems very good !!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for bathroom after remodel. Perfect size and looks great. Sturdy construction - I was surprised how heavy duty the parts were. A little time consumong to install and helped to have 2 people just to hold the different parts.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bathroom Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Shelf. It was everything described and better. Looks great in my new bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: BBR Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Glass shelf shattered
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a little over two years, the glass shelf shattered. I was just drying my hands with the towel on the rack and the tugging pressure caused the right side of the shelf to collapse. Don't buy this fragile towel rack!
customer_reviews.author: elephantlover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shelf...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shelf. Tiny but its fancy enough to impress. Exactly what I wanted! Hubby had it up in 10 mins.
customer_reviews.author: kristina kelly

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and looks great! I placed it in my shower so i'll see how well it holds up to the moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Tim

customer_reviews.title: great little shelf
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Just look at the dimensions, the shelf IS very small. Not big enough to even keep a tissue box on. I needed something that small for a tiny apartment bathroom so it is perfect. Sturdy, the metal is exactly as pictured, and the glass is textured on the bottom. It looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa O'Neil

customer_reviews.title: it appears to be a good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Missing the four main/wall screws but instead of going through the hassle of returning, I just used the screws I had at home. Other than that, it appears to be a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrt

customer_reviews.title: Need a tiny screwdriver to install
customer_reviews.text: Rod is not that sturdy. After putting the rod and glass in, you would need a touch of super glue otherwise these would move a little. Plus you really need a small screwdriver to install the screws on the bottom of both handles. Overall it looks good when installed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 20 Minute Install
customer_reviews.text: 20 minute install after tools collected. Drill, small bit to start concise hole, 1⁄4” bit, tape for template, level, Philips screwdriver, and precision regular screwdriver. I needed the help of another person to hold the shelf and bar for 30 seconds to finish the install. Don’t overtighten screws (go until plate is tight against wall). Template made it much easier to install. Solid product and nice look.
customer_reviews.author: Lobotomy

customer_reviews.title: Love this, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love this, looks great!! Have it over the jacuzzi bathtub with towels I purchased from here. Nice price also. I saw said it was small - I found it perfect size for decorative towel set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shelf/towel holder! Easy to install. Looks really nice, bought another for guest bath.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is a little tricky to put together, and takes 2 to hand, but lovely to l9ok at and fully functional
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Spot on!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little shelf for my bathroom. It really completes the look.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Sinclair

product_meta.title: Organize It All 16905W-1 Satin Nickel Glass Shelf with Towel Bar, 1-Pack
product_meta.description: This satin nickel wall mounting glass shelf with towel bar is constructed with a sturdy metal frame. The shelf is made of tempered glass and has a satin nickel finish. The towel bar is perfect for creating extra space in bathroom.
feature_bullets: Constructed with a sturdy metal frame, tempered glass shelf and satin nickel finish
Designed will add a clean, sophisticated look to any bathroom decor.
A wide single towel bar is perfect for hanging his and her towels in a master bath, or hand towels and washcloths in a guest bath
Dimensions : 4.5 H x 22.75 W x 4.75 D inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars904 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
